synergynet3.activitypack1.table.fishes.birdmodel

Class Bird

  • java.lang.Object
    • synergynet3.activitypack1.table.fishes.birdmodel.Bird
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Food, Obstacle, Predator

    public class Bird
extends java.lang.Object
    This class represents one of the birds, either green or blue. Birds try to flock with birds of the same color and avoid different color birds, predators, and obstacles.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Michael LaLena

      • move

        public void move(float newHeading)
        Causes the bird to attempt to face a new direction. Based on maxTurnTheta, the bird may not be able to complete the turn.
        Parameters:
        newHeading - The direction in degrees that the bird should turn toward.
